ch0027_40_natane/0101_0701_01_10:
Ahoy, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you to come aboard!
ch0027_40_natane/0101_0701_02_10:
It’s time to pull up whatever’s anchoring our
spirits and head out for the open sea!
ch0027_40_natane/7101_0701_01_10:
Check out my outfit! Something about it makes me
feel powerful and hungry for adventure.
ch0027_40_natane/7101_0701_02_10:
Honestly, I just want to be out searching for buried
treasure or something!
ch0027_40_natane/7102_0701_01_10:
Anchors aweigh! Yo-ho-ho!
...Well? What do you think? Can I pull it off?
ch0027_40_natane/7102_0701_02_10:
Apparently “anchors aweigh” is ship lingo that
means the anchor has been hoisted and the
voyage can officially begin!
ch0027_40_natane/7102_0701_03_10:
It makes me feel powerful—maybe I’ll say that
at the start of my next battle!
ch0027_40_natane/7103_0701_01_10:
The shining sun, the bright blue sky—I just love
hot, clear days!
ch0027_40_natane/7103_0701_02_10:
Know why? Because I get to see Grass-type
Pokémon soaking it all up!
ch0027_40_natane/7103_0701_03_10:
Maybe next time I’ll take them all out on a ship so
we can cruise across the sea together!
ch0027_40_natane/7104_0701_01_10:
Some Grass-type Pokémon, like Dhelmise or Lotad,
live in the water.
ch0027_40_natane/7104_0701_02_10:
They’ve got a different kind of charm from the
Grass-types who live on land...
ch0027_40_natane/7104_0701_03_10:
I can kinda understand how people who love
water Pokémon feel.
ch0027_40_natane/7105_0701_02_10:
I mean, of course there isn’t! I don’t see anything,
so that must mean nothing’s there!
ch0027_40_natane/7105_0701_03_10:
Allister and Phoebe were staring really hard at
something over my shoulder, though...
ch0027_40_natane/7105_0701_04_10: I’m sure I’m just overthinking things...right?
ch0027_40_natane/1701_0701_01_10: I found this on the beach...but you can have it!
ch0027_40_natane/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you find that treasure useful!
ch0027_40_natane/2501_0701_01_10:
Ever since I came to Pasio, I’ve been running into
Pokémon I’ve never seen before much more often.
ch0027_40_natane/2501_0701_02_10:
Every time I see a Grass-type Pokémon that looks
like a ghost, it always makes me jump!
ch0027_40_natane/2501_0701_03_10:
The same thing happened with Dhelmise. It’s cute,
but I’m still just a little bit scared of it...
ch0027_40_natane/2501_0702_01_10:
Is there a Pokémon like that for you? One that’s a
mix of your favorite and least favorite types?
ch0027_40_natane/2501_0702_02_10:
Well hey, if there are, let’s try our best to warm
up to them!
ch0027_40_natane/2511_0701_01_10:
Back when Sinnoh was still called Hisui, the people
who lived there used to think Pokémon were
terrifying creatures!
ch0027_40_natane/2511_0701_03_10:
Maybe that’s because Pokémon weren’t very well
understood back then.
ch0027_40_natane/2511_0701_04_10:
I suppose if we learn more about ghosts the way
we did with Pokémon, they might become less
frightening.
ch0027_40_natane/2511_0702_01_10:
Oh, guess what! I heard that back in the Hisui
region, there was a person like me who knew a
lot about plants!
ch0027_40_natane/2511_0702_02_10:
Apparently they used to take care of their village’s
fields, where the vegetables grew...
ch0027_40_natane/2511_0702_03_10: Maybe I’ll try growing my own vegetables, too!
ch0027_40_natane/3001_0701_01_10:
Ahoy! Nice morning today, isn’t it? Breathing in the
sea air can really help clear your mind!
ch0027_40_natane/3003_0701_01_10:
Today’s weather is perfect for sailing! I’d love to
hop on a ship and cruise around the island on a
day like this!
ch0027_40_natane/3005_0701_01_10:
Hey...we’d better go home soon, before it gets
dark. Y-you’ll walk back with me...won’t you?
